OOC: Okay.  I'm pissed off.  I don't care who's right.  This argument is 
dividing the group again.  LN needs to work it out with the council on his 
own.  Because, frankly NO ONE else has any business in this discussion.  Now 
I have other problems to worry about without this adding MORE STRESS!

::Nu::
     She had been forgotten on an island by the weapons dealer.  She goes and 
gets her gun back and heads off the island towards the continent of Africa.

--part1_c.19124f26.2891bfeb_boundary
